docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: AMENDMENT IV. ...To be secure ... against unreasonable searches and seizures....

headline.main: Drugs, AIDS and the Threat to Privacy

docs.snippet: LEAD: AMENDMENT IV. ...To be secure ... against unreasonable searches and seizures....

byline.original: By Yale Kamisar; Yale Kamisar is Henry K. Ransom Professor of Law at the University of Michigan Law School and co-author of ''Modern Criminal Procedure'' and ''Constitutional Law: Cases, Comments and Questions.''

docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: EXPERTS are split in their views on one of the most crucial questions of the AIDS epidemic: how many of those who are infected with the AIDS virus will eventually develop the fatal disorder.
docs.snippet: LEAD: EXPERTS are split in their views on one of the most crucial questions of the AIDS epidemic: how many of those who are infected with the AIDS virus will eventually develop the fatal disorder.
